segments.text: Oh no, look at all that water on the floor, it's just pouring out of the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is standing right there, drying dishes like nothing is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel so bad for her, she's going to have a big mess to clean up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the kids, oh they're being so naughty, trying to sneak cookies like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a stool, reaching for the cookie jar, he's going to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't hurt himself, that stool looks so unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her cookie, not helping at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like this is just a sad situation all around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around soon and sees what's happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Maybe she can stop the kids and clean up the water before it gets worse.
segments.speaker: PAR
